resources.string: Permissions are required to stream audio.
Keep screen on when in foreground

HARK is designed with a strong commitment to user privacy, ensuring that all data logging remains local to your device. The application records technical diagnostics, including device hardware specifications, Android version, Bluetooth connectivity status, and app-specific interactions such as setting adjustments, solely for the purpose of troubleshooting and performance optimization. Importantly, HARK does not automatically transmit, upload, or share this data with any external servers; logs are stored in a temporary session file that is automatically deleted each time the app is restarted. No personally identifiable information, precise location data, or audio content is ever collected or recorded, and diagnostic logs are only transmitted if you explicitly choose to share them via the application settings for support purposes.
Developed by Thivyan Pillay (Version not found)
Noise suppression is not available on this device.
Dynamics Processing is not available on this device.
